Articles.Content: Hi, recently ckan started uninstalling itself automatically without me even noticing. Do someone knows why this happens ? is it a problem im the only one to experience  ?, i need help to solve this because every time ckan uninstalls and i have to reinstall it , i have to do the same with all the mods and with ksp itself

38 minutes ago, GutwPC said:

Hi, recently ckan started uninstalling itself automatically without me even noticing. Do someone knows why this happens ? is it a problem im the only one to experience  ?, i need help to solve this because every time ckan uninstalls and i have to reinstall it , i have to do the same with all the mods and with ksp itself

Weird.  Do you have an antivirus which might be doing it?
